entry.def: A monkey is an animal with a long tail which lives in hot countries and climbs trees.
If you refer to a child as a monkey, you are saying in an affectionate way that he or she is very lively and naughty.

means.word_mean: 1. any of various long-tailed primates (excluding the prosimians)
1. play around with or alter or falsify, usually secretively or dishonestly;

sentences.sentence: "Someone tampered with the documents on my desk"

means.word_mean: 2. do random, unplanned work or activities or spend time idly;
